name: Post Title (TypeWriter)
author: Pearlbells

sections.description:
Do you want to display flash news / post titles in your webpage or post?
This plugin help to display post titles in your page /post/sidebar/footer as a loop with typewriter effect.

How to Install & Demo – Click here

It is possible to customise the display features to sync with the look and feel of your website. The customisation features include:

  • can set width and height of flash news area
  • can set background color
  • can set padding
  • can set font color and font size
  • can set delay / speed between flashing news
  • can add as many news as you want
  • can set the border radius (New)
  • option to add heading (New)
sections.installation:
1. Download the zip file .
  2. Login to wordpress admin area.
  3. select plugin -> add new
  4. select upload from top menu on the page.
  5. click browse and select the zip file.
  6. click ‘install now’
  7. click activate the plugin.
  8. Go to the webpage where you want to display flash news and enter [pearl_news_flash_display]
  9. If want to display the post titles based on the category please enter [pearl_news_flash_display category='category-name']
    10.If you want to display custom post type enter [pearl_news_flash_display post_type='custom_post_name']
    11.If you want to customize post per page please enter [pearl_news_flash_display category='category-name' posts_per_page = 5]
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Download the zip file .
  2. Login to wordpress admin area.
  3. select plugin -> add new
  4. select upload from top menu on the page.
  5. click browse and select the zip file.
  6. click ‘install now’
  7. click activate the plugin.
  8. Go to the webpage where you want to display flash news and enter [pearl_news_flash_display]
  9. If want to display the post titles based on the category please enter [pearl_news_flash_display category='category-name']
    10.If you want to display custom post type enter [pearl_news_flash_display post_type='custom_post_name']
    11.If you want to customize post per page please enter [pearl_news_flash_display category='category-name' posts_per_page = 5]

Can I customise the news feed to match with my website?

Yes you can customise it from the backend.

How many flash news can I include ?

You can add as many news as you want from the backend.

Can I set delay/speed between the loops?

Yes you can customise it from the backend.
